meanings.sent1: She slathered butter on her toast.
meanings.sent2: The chef slathered sauce on the ribs before grilling.
meanings.sent3: The kids slathered sunscreen on each other at the beach.
meanings.sent4: He slathered compliments on his boss to get a promotion.

meanings.definition: Covered or coated with a thick layer
meanings.sent1: The sandwich was slathered with mayonnaise.
meanings.sent2: The cake was slathered in frosting and sprinkles.
meanings.sent3: The puppy came inside, slathered in mud from playing outside.
meanings.sent4: The car was slathered in advertisements for the new movie.
meanings.sent5: The mountain was slathered in snow, creating a beautiful winter scene.
